tubular-widget.directives Module

directives

  • tbWidgetContainer - The `tbWidgetContainer` directive is a root node to attach widgets.
  • tbWidget - The `tbWidget` directive to transclude your content in a panel with several options.
  • tbWidgetActions - The `tbWidgetActios` directive to transclude your content in a header panel with several options. Actions will need to be sent to the $parent scope
